name: Trouser Snake
description:
Trouser Snake 1.1!

(Written in python & pygame)

-----------------------------------------

6/2/15 First version

7/2/15 Nut orientation fixed

13/2/15 More sound FX, Fixed viagra detection bug, trouser snake now speeds up every 10 points

20/2/15 Can't accidentally go back on your self, bring on the high scores!

21/2/15 Viagra no longer spawns under shaft

23/2/15 Leader board bug fixed
